compnet 0.0.0.9000

    The 'compnet' workflow

    Function reference

    All functions

    buildcompnet()
    Network models of interspecific competition with presence-absence data
    compnet compnet-package
    The 'compnet' package.
    compute_gofstats()
    Compute summary statistics quantifying row/column-level and third order dependencies in a symmetric matrix with NA diagonals
    ex_phylo
    Phylogenetic distance between species pairs in a simulated metacommunity dataset with 24 species
    ex_presabs
    A simulated metacommunity presence-absence matrix in which rows represent sites and columns represent species
    ex_traits
    Species-level data for two traits in a simulated metacommunity dataset with 24 species
    expit()
    Inverse logit function
    fixedeff_violins()
    Violin plots of fixed effect coefficients in a compnet model
    gofstats()
    Report quantiles of gofstats values for observed data relative to posterior predictive distribution
    postpredsamp()
    Simulate posterior predictive samples from a compnet model
    rbetabinom()
    Simulate draws from a beta-binomial distribution
    scatter_interaction()
    Make an automated plot of the interactive effect of two species' values of the same trait.
    scatter_interaction_getdata()
    Get data for a plot of the interactive effect of two species' values of the same trait.
    scatter_pairvar()
    Make an automated plot of the effect of a pair-level variable like phylogenetic distance
    scatter_pairvar_getdata()
    Get data for a plot of the effect of a pair-level variable like phylogenetic distance
    summarize_compnet()
    Summarizing compnet model output

    Developed by Kyle Rosenblad.
